title: Racism COVID Spike, Zombies R Back? 3.8.21
itunes:title: Racism COVID Spike, Zombies R Back? 3.8.21
description:
In episode 826, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Tamara Yajia to discuss Greg Abbott's racist accusations while withholding testing funds, Joe Biden's relief bill, more info coming out about Andrew Cuomo, zombies in South Korea, the new USPS truck, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. With the pandemic far from over, Texas leaders blame immigrants for spreading the virus
  2. Texas Gov. Abbott stalled federal offer to test migrants then blamed them for spreading Covid
  3. Democrats Might Make Sane Political Decision, Move to Spare Millions of Americans From Surprise Tax Bills
  4. Biden's relief bill isn't getting bipartisan support like previous stimulus bills. What do Republicans dislike so much?
  5. 25-Year-Old Cuomo Accuser: Governor 'Was Trying to Sleep With Me'
  6. Cuomo Aides Rewrote Nursing Home Report to Hide Higher Death Toll
  7. Zombies are everywhere in South Korea, feeding on fears and anxieties
  8. Giving the USPS truck even more Pixar vibes
  9. US Postal Service's new mail truck delivers mixed bag of responses
  10. USPS unveils next-generation mail truck with electric drivetrain option
  11. Losing Bid for Postal Contract Proves Costly for Electric-Vehicle Maker
  12. WATCH: Tropa Magica - Come As You Are

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
